NAME: Zaccharie Risacher

NAME: N'Faly Dante
COMMENT: Dec 23: Dante will undergo season-ending surgery to repair a torn ACL in his right knee, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.

COMMENT: Jan 24: Minott (ankle) is out for Saturday's game against the Bulls, Justin Turpin of WEEI.com reports.

COMMENT: Oct 9: The Celtics have not ruled Tatum (Achilles) out for the 2025-26 season, ESPN's Shams Charania reported on the Pat McAfee Show on Thursday.

NAME: Nolan Traore
COMMENT: Jan 24: Traore has been ruled out for Sunday's game against the Clippers due to illness.

NAME: Noah Clowney
COMMENT: Jan 24: Clowney (back) is doubtful to play Sunday against the Clippers, Brian Lewis of the New York Post reports.

NAME: Cam Thomas
COMMENT: Jan 24: Thomas won't play in Sunday's game against the Clippers due to a sprained left ankle.

COMMENT: Jan 19: Highsmith (knee) is out for Monday's game against the Suns.

NAME: KJ Simpson
COMMENT: Jan 23: Simpson (hip) has been ruled out for Saturday's game against the Wizards.

NAME: Mason Plumlee
COMMENT: Dec 31: Plumlee underwent surgery to address his right groin injury and will be reevaluated in six weeks, the Hornets announced.

COMMENT: Jan 23: Jones (hamstring) will be re-evaluated in two weeks, Will Gottlieb of AllCHGO.com reports.

NAME: Noa Essengue
COMMENT: Dec 3: Essengue will undergo left shoulder surgery and will miss the remainder of the 2025-26 season, K.C. Johnson of Chicago Sports Network reports.

COMMENT: Jan 24: Merrill (hand) has been ruled out for Saturday's game against the Magic.

COMMENT: Jan 24: Livingston agreed to a two-way contract with the Cavaliers on Friday, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.

NAME: Darius Garland
COMMENT: Jan 18: Garland will be re-evaluated in the next 7-to-10 days after being diagnosed with a Grade 1 right big toe sprain.

NAME: Max Strus
COMMENT: Jan 6: Strus (foot) is expected to miss at least four more weeks, Marc J. Spears of ESPN.com reports.

NAME: Moussa Cisse
COMMENT: Jan 24: Cisse (illness) won't play in Saturday's game against the Lakers.

NAME: Anthony Davis
COMMENT: Jan 13: A second opinion revealed Davis (finger) won't require surgery, and he'll be re-evaluated in six weeks, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.

NAME: Dereck Lively II
COMMENT: Dec 21: Lively successfully underwent surgery on his right foot Sunday.

NAME: Kyrie Irving
COMMENT: Dec 13: Irving (knee) remains out indefinitely and doesn't have a return timetable, Mavericks reporter Grant Afseth said during an appearance on HoopsHype's podcast 'Around the Beat' on Friday.

NAME: Dante Exum
COMMENT: Nov 20: The Mavericks announced Thursday that Exum will undergo season-ending knee surgery.

COMMENT: Jan 24: Valanciunas (calf) is questionable to play Sunday in Memphis.

COMMENT: Jan 24: Gordon (hamstring) has been ruled out for Sunday's game in Memphis.

COMMENT: Jan 24: Murray (hamstring/hip) is listed as questionable for Sunday's game against Memphis.

NAME: Cameron Johnson

COMMENT: Jan 14: Jokic (knee) has resumed on-court workouts, ESPN's Shams Charania reports.

COMMENT: Jan 24: LeVert (illness) is doubtful for Sunday's game against the Kings.

COMMENT: Jan 24: Kuminga is out for Saturday's game against Minnesota due to left knee soreness.

COMMENT: Jan 24: Horford (left toe injury management) is questionable for Sunday's game against Minnesota.

COMMENT: Jan 24: Curry is listed as questionable for Sunday's game against Minnesota due to right knee soreness.

COMMENT: Jan 20: Butler's injury from Monday Night's game involves a torn right ACL and he will be out for the rest of the season, per Shams Charania of ESPN.

COMMENT: Jan 23: Eason (rest) will not play Friday against the Pistons.

COMMENT: Jan 23: Holiday is out for Friday's game against the Pistons due to back spasms.

COMMENT: Jan 20: Head coach Ime Udoka said Tuesday that Adams suffered a "severely sprained, Grade 3 ankle sprain" and will be out indefinitely, Vanessa Richardson of Space City Home Network reports.

NAME: Fred VanVleet
COMMENT: Sep 22: VanVleet suffered a torn ACL and may be out for the entire 2025-26 campaign, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.

COMMENT: Jan 23: Jackson (ankle) won't play in Friday's game against the Thunder, Dustin Dopirak of The Indianapolis Star reports.

COMMENT: Jan 22: Mathurin (thumb) has been ruled out for Friday's game against the Thunder.

COMMENT: Oct 31: Toppin will undergo surgery to place a screw in his right foot Monday, Dustin Dopirak of The Indianapolis Star reports.

COMMENT: Jul 7: Haliburton will miss the entire 2025-26 season while recovering from surgery on his right Achilles tendon, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.

NAME: Kawhi Leonard
COMMENT: Jan 24: Leonard (knee/illness) is listed as questionable for Sunday's game against Brooklyn, Joey Linn of SI.com reports.

COMMENT: Jan 24: Bogdanovic (hamstring) won't play Sunday against the Nets.

COMMENT: Jan 4: Jones has been diagnosed with a Grade 2 MCL sprain in his right knee and will be re-evaluated in six weeks, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.

NAME: Bradley Beal
COMMENT: Nov 12: Beal will undergo season-ending surgery on his left hip, ESPN's Shams Charania reports.

NAME: Austin Reaves
COMMENT: Jan 24: Head coach JJ Redick said that Reaves scrimmaged Saturday and that Reaves should be able to return "sooner than later," Dan Woike of The Athletic reports.

NAME: Adou Thiero
COMMENT: Dec 31: Thiero will miss at least four weeks with a right MCL sprain, Law Murray of The Athletic reports.

NAME: Santi Aldama
COMMENT: Jan 24: Aldama (knee) has been ruled out for Sunday's game versus the Nuggets.

NAME: Ty Jerome
COMMENT: Jan 24: Grizzlies head coach Tuomas Iisalo said Friday that Jerome (calf) is likely to make his season debut within 1-to-2 weeks, Jonah Dylan of The Memphis Commercial Appeal reports.

COMMENT: Jan 24: Morant (elbow) will be reevaluated in approximately three weeks, the Grizzlies announced Saturday.

NAME: Scotty Pippen Jr.
COMMENT: Jan 14: The Grizzlies announced Wednesday that Pippen is progressing well in his recovery from left toe surgery and is expected to return in 4-6 weeks.

NAME: Zach Edey
COMMENT: Jan 14: The Grizzlies announced Wednesday that Edey continues to recover from a stress reaction in his left ankle and will maintain his current plan of offloading and rehabilitation before being re-evaluated in six weeks.

NAME: Brandon Clarke
COMMENT: Jan 14: Clarke is progressing well from his Grade 2 right calf strain and is expected to return in four to six weeks, the Grizzlies announced Wednesday.

NAME: Davion Mitchell
COMMENT: Jan 24: Mitchell (shoulder) is out for Saturday's game against the Jazz, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

NAME: Kel'el Ware
COMMENT: Jan 23: Ware returned to Miami for treatment on his strained right hamstring Thursday, and he won't play in the Heat's back-to-back set against the Jazz on Saturday and the Suns on Sunday, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

NAME: Tyler Herro
COMMENT: Jan 19: An MRI revealed a costochondral issue with Herro's ribs that will sideline him for Miami's five-game road trip, Anthony Chiang of the Miami Herald reports.

NAME: Terry Rozier
COMMENT: Oct 23: The NBA placed Rozier on immediate leave from the Heat on Thursday, ESPN's Shams Charania reports.

NAME: Gary Trent Jr.
COMMENT: Jan 24: Trent (illness) is probable for Sunday's game against the Mavericks.

NAME: AJ Green
COMMENT: Jan 24: Green (illness) is listed as questionable for Sunday's game against Dallas.

NAME: Giannis Antetokounmpo
COMMENT: Jan 24: Antetokounmpo said after Friday's 102-100 loss to the Nuggets that he expects to be sidelined for at least 4-to-6 weeks due to the right calf injury he appeared to suffer during the first quarter, Jamal Collier of ESPN.com reports.

NAME: Kevin Porter Jr.
COMMENT: Jan 21: Doc Rivers said that Porter (oblique) won't play "any time soon," and he's without an official timetable to return, Justin Garcia of Locked On Bucks reports.

NAME: Taurean Prince
COMMENT: Jan 1: The Bucks applied for a Disabled Player Exception for Prince earlier this month, indicating that they anticipate that he's "substantially more likely than not" to be unable to play through June 15, Eric Nehm of The Athletic reports.

NAME: Terrence Shannon Jr.
COMMENT: Jan 19: Shannon (foot) has been ruled out for Tuesday's game against the Jazz.

NAME: Jose Alvarado
COMMENT: Jan 24: Alvarado (oblique) is listed as questionable for Sunday's game against San Antonio.

NAME: Dejounte Murray
COMMENT: Jan 7: Pelicans head coach James Borrego said Sunday that Murray (Achilles) is "making a lot of progress" but doesn't appear to be close to making his season debut, Rod Walker of The New Orleans Times-Picayune reports. "We hope to get him back in our building here soon. He's doing a lot of work getting ready to get back here," Borrego said of Murray. "I say in the next month we'll have a little bit more clarity on where he's at. But he's made a lot of progress. Significant progress."

NAME: Ajay Mitchell
COMMENT: Jan 24: Mitchell (abdomen) won't play Sunday against the Raptors.

COMMENT: Jan 24: Hartenstein (calf) won't play in Sunday's game against Toronto.

COMMENT: Jan 24: Wiggins is questionable to play Sunday versus the Raptors due to a right hip impingement.

NAME: Jalen Williams
COMMENT: Jan 19: Williams (hamstring) will be re-evaluated in two weeks, Justin Martinez of The Oklahoman reports.

NAME: Nikola Topic
COMMENT: Oct 30: Topic has been diagnosed with testicular cancer, Thunder general manager Sam Presti announced Thursday, Justin Martinez of The Oklahoman reports.

NAME: Thomas Sorber
COMMENT: Sep 5: The Thunder announced Friday that Sorber has sustained a torn ACL in his right knee during an offseason workout, NBA reporter Marc Stein reports.

NAME: Franz Wagner
COMMENT: Jan 23: Wagner (ankle) has been ruled out for Saturday's game against the Cavaliers.

NAME: Colin Castleton
COMMENT: Nov 24: The Magic plan to sign Castleton to a two-way deal, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.

NAME: Jalen Green
COMMENT: Jan 24: Green (hamstring) is questionable for Sunday's game against Miami, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

COMMENT: Jan 24: Reath (foot) has been ruled out for Friday's game against the Raptors, Casey Holdahl of the Trail Blazers' official site reports.

COMMENT: Jan 24: Avdija (back) has been ruled out for Friday's game against the Raptors, though he will travel with the Trail Blazers for their upcoming three-game road trip, Danny Marang of 1080 The Fan Portland reports.

COMMENT: Jan 23: Murray is out for Friday's game against Toronto due to a lumbar strain.

COMMENT: Jan 23: Henderson (hamstring) will not play Friday against the Raptors.

COMMENT: Jan 16: Thybulle (knee, thumb) won't play Saturday versus the Lakers and remains without a timetable to return.

NAME: Blake Wesley
COMMENT: Nov 5: Wesley underwent a successful procedure to repair a fracture of the fifth metatarsal base in his right foot Wednesday, and he's expected to be sidelined for 8-12 weeks, Brett Siegel of ClutchPoints.com reports.

NAME: Damian Lillard
COMMENT: Sep 25: Lillard won't be back on the court for the 2025-26 season, as he made clear during an interview with YouTube influencer Speed on Wednesday.

COMMENT: Jan 24: LaVine is now questionable for Sunday's game against the Pistons due to low back soreness.

COMMENT: Jan 24: Kornet (thigh) is listed as questionable for Sunday's game against the Pelicans, Paul Garcia of ProjectSpurs.com reports.

NAME: David Jones Garcia

COMMENT: Jan 24: Murray-Boyles (thumb) is questionable for Sunday's game in Oklahoma City.

COMMENT: Jan 21: Poeltl (back) isn't with the team on their road trip and is seeing a specialist in Toronto on Thursday, Michael Grange of Sportsnet.ca reports.

COMMENT: Jan 24: Markkanen (conditioning) has been ruled out for Saturday's game against the Heat.

NAME: Elijah Harkless
COMMENT: Jan 13: Harkless finished Monday's 105-103 win over the Celtics with three points (1-4 FG, 0-2 3Pt, 1-1 FT), one rebound, two assists and one steal across 21 minutes.

NAME: Walker Kessler
COMMENT: Nov 5: Kessler will undergo left shoulder surgery and will miss the remainder of the 2025-26 season, Tony Jones of The Athletic reports.

COMMENT: Jan 24: Johnson (illness) will not play Saturday against the Hornets.

NAME: Tristan Vukcevic

COMMENT: Jan 23: Coulibaly (back) will not play Saturday against Charlotte.

COMMENT: Jan 15: Whitmore has begun the recovery process for a diagnosed venous condition and he will miss the remainder of the 2025-26 season.
